unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post draft on Exam Prep Apps:
normalised: Okay, here's a Quora post draft on Exam Prep Apps:

unnormalised: Hey everyone! So, I'm gearing up for the UPSC exams in 2024 (yes, already!), and I've been deep-diving into the world of exam prep apps. What are *your* experiences? Are they actually helpful, or just another distraction alongside the reels?
normalised: Hey everyone! So, I'm gearing up for the U P S C exams in two thousand and twenty four (yes, already!), and I've been deep-diving into the world of exam prep apps. What are *your* experiences? Are they actually helpful, or just another distraction alongside the reels?

unnormalised: I’ve tried a few like Gradeup (now BYJU's Exam Prep) and Testbook. Some features are genuinely useful, like the mock tests – seriously good practice for that 3-hour marathon on exam day. Plus, analyzing my performance helps pinpoint my weak areas (ahem, geography!). But honestly, the sheer volume of "study material" can be overwhelming. I'm starting to think a good old NCERT textbook and focused study sessions might be better!
normalised: I’ve tried a few like Gradeup (now B Y J U's Exam Prep) and Testbook. Some features are genuinely useful, like the mock tests – seriously good practice for that three-hour marathon on exam day. Plus, analyzing my performance helps pinpoint my weak areas (ahem, geography!). But honestly, the sheer volume of "study material" can be overwhelming. I'm starting to think a good old N C E R T textbook and focused study sessions might be better!

unnormalised: Anyone have any recommendations for apps specifically good for cracking the IIT-JEE? My younger brother, Rohan, is starting his prep soon and I want to point him in the right direction. Heard good things about Vedantu, but it's quite an investment, like Rs. 50,000 for a course. Worth it?
normalised: Anyone have any recommendations for apps specifically good for cracking the I I T-J E E? My younger brother, Rohan, is starting his prep soon and I want to point him in the right direction. Heard good things about Vedantu, but it's quite an investment, like rupee fifty thousand for a course. Worth it?

unnormalised: Also, any tips on avoiding distractions while using these apps? The notifications are relentless! I swear I get a "motivational" quote at 06:00 hrs every morning.
normalised: Also, any tips on avoiding distractions while using these apps? The notifications are relentless! I swear I get a "motivational" quote at zero six hundred hours every morning.

unnormalised: I'm also interested in apps that offer localized content – like focus on Rajasthan state exams – if anyone knows of any. The general knowledge section is always tricky, especially remembering those obscure historical dates.
normalised: I'm also interested in apps that offer localized content – like focus on Rajasthan state exams – if anyone knows of any. The general knowledge section is always tricky, especially remembering those obscure historical dates.

unnormalised: Share your thoughts! Exam season is stressful enough; let's help each other out! I need to clear Prelims by 26/05/2024! Good luck with your studies – see you at the chai stall near the library afterwards (around 17:00 hrs, maybe?). Thanks!
normalised: Share your thoughts! Exam season is stressful enough; let's help each other out! I need to clear Prelims by twenty sixth May two thousand and twenty four! Good luck with your studies – see you at the chai stall near the library afterwards (around seventeen hundred hours, maybe?). Thanks!
